member.name: ISharedBitmap.Detach
member.summary: Retrieves the bitmap contained in an object, and returns a copy if the contained bitmap resides in shared memory. After calling this method the bitmap is no longer associated with this ISharedBitmap and you cannot call or ISharedBitmap.Detach on it again.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a handle to the bitmap to retrieve.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISharedBitmap.GetFormat
member.summary: Retrieves the alpha type of the bitmap image.

param.name: pat
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the alpha type of the bitmap image. One of the following values.
The bitmap does not contain an alpha channel for transparency.
The bitmap contains an alpha channel for transparency.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISharedBitmap.GetSharedBitmap
member.summary: Retrieves the bitmap contained in an object.
member.param: A pointer to a handle to the bitmap.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISharedBitmap.GetSize
member.summary: Retrieves the size of the bitmap contained in an object.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a value that specifies the size, in pixels, of the contained bitmap.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISharedBitmap.InitializeBitmap
member.summary: Initializes a new object with a given bitmap.
member.param: A handle to the bitmap with which to initialize a new object. The bitmap must be a DIB.

param.name: wtsAT
param.para: The alpha type of the bitmap image. May be one of the following values.
Cannot determine whether the bitmap has an alpha channel.
The bitmap does not contain an alpha channel for transparency.
The bitmap contains an alpha channel for transparency.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISharedBitmap
member.summary: Exposes memory-efficient methods for accessing bitmaps. This interface is used as a thin wrapper around HBITMAP objects, allowing those objects to be reference counted and protected from having their underlying data changed.
